content.rendered:
Hundreds of penniless players accept a special invitation to test their skills in games for kids. A tempting charge – and a deadly peril – awaits them.”

Number of seasons: 1 (2021- )

Status: Ongoing

Creator: Hwang Dong-hyuk

Channel: Netflix

Starring: Lee Jung-jae, Park Hae-soo, Mohamed Elgendy
